Inside our PreRunner SR5, find comfortable cloth seating, a power outlet, power accessories, plus a sound system complete with an AM/FM/CD/Cassette player. Straightforward technology, easy to read gauges, and lots of comfortable passenger space make this Tacoma an absolute pleasure. 1 owner 1997 BMW E36 m3 manual s52 California car only 51k original miles, and a well-respected presentation inside and out, aided by factory installed Dinan s3 package including a supercharger, tune, suspension, exhaust, and various other supporting upgrades. Alpine white with black interior including vadar seats approaching a time capsule kind of appearance. This M3 comes loaded with features like power windows, power locks, keyless entry, cruise control, and a full AM/FM/cassette premium audio system with CD changer. The car is in showroom condition body has no dents or dings paint is near perfect as well. The car was used as a daily driver in the late 90s early 2000s and has been stored in a private collection since. The vehicle has had a recent service including 4 brand new Bridgestone potenza tires, ac compressor, radiator fan replacement, fuel filter,and a full flush of all fluids. The sale comes complete with the original window sticker, owner's manual packet, key fob with alarm factory, and warranty card as well as some dealership items received when car was purchased new from bmw weatherford in Berkeley CA. In addition the car has all of its original stickers and vin tags that match on every panel on the car. This is a collector-level car that also comes with the right paperwork.
